section.name: Practices
section.p: AstroGrid components must be buildable and executable on Windows and GNU/Linux platforms. Eclipse is the recommended IDE, but the choice is left to individual preference provided it does not impair our development processes. All code in CVS must be buildable by Maven at all times, both as snapshots and branched artifacts, and it is strongly recommended that developers install a copy of Maven and build using it regularly.
